sector.name: Part 2: Exploration
sector.sign: West - Marshy Tower|East - Lake Tower|South - Vault Tower
sector.string: You're now exploring the great outdoors! When outdoors, each tile on the map represents a larger space, so each move you make takes more in-game time.
In the outdoors, you'll find entrances to towns or dungeons like the tower from which you're emerging now.

Clearing many BoE scenarios usually requires a thorough exploration of the outdoors and every town or dungeon you can find. First of all, you should open your minimap to help keep track of where you've been! Type 'a' to do so.
To read a sign, use the Look command. You can do this by typing 'l' or clicking the button of the eye. You have to be standing next to things like signs or books to investigate them closely.
You can also look by right-clicking.
The terrain is getting wilder as you make your way westward. You should move diagonally to avoid dangerous terrain where possible, but this might not always be possible.
